snippet: Political insecurities have re-emerged over the possibility that Hsieh Su-wei, the first Taiwanese player to win a Grand Slam, could shift her allegiance to China as part of an endorsement deal.
abstract: Reports that Taiwanese tennis player Hsieh Su-Wei could shift her allegiance to China as part of an endorsement deal has stirred political insecurities in Taiwan; Taiwan government has mobilized domestic companies to offer Hsieh endorsement deals in response.
lead_paragraph: Political insecurities have re-emerged over the possibility that Hsieh Su-wei, the first Taiwanese player to win a Grand Slam, could shift her allegiance to China as part of an endorsement deal.

headline.main: Taiwan’s Tennis Ace Flirts With China. How Could She? Cash.
headline.print_headline: Taiwan’s Tennis Ace Flirts With China. How Could She? Cash.
